name: Preformed Line Products Company
description: Preformed Line Products Company (PLPC) is a leading manufacturer of products that support the infrastructure of the telecommunications and electric utility industries. Founded in 1947, PLPC specializes in designing, engineering, and producing a wide range of high-quality products, including hardware and accessories that facilitate the installation and maintenance of overhead and underground distribution systems. With a commitment to innovation, PLPC has developed advanced solutions such as cable anchoring systems, splicing kits, and other specialized products that enhance the performance and reliability of utility networks. Headquartered in Mayfield Village, Ohio, the company operates on a global scale, serving customers in over 100 countries. PLPC is dedicated to sustainability and has integrated environmentally friendly practices into its manufacturing processes. The company's mission is to deliver durable and effective solutions that meet the evolving needs of its customers while adhering to the highest standards of quality and safety. As telecommunications and energy infrastructure continue to evolve, PLPC remains at the forefront, leveraging technology and expertise to support the growth of these critical sectors.
